channel.title: How to add another crown icon?
channel.description:
ok in client i have a moderator and a admin crown icon. MODICONS 0 MODICONS 1
i was trying to add another crown in but it wont work? like i try adding MODICONS 2 for an owner crown
then when i log in its back to MODICONS 1 the admin crown. i want to just add another crown. how do i do it?

item.title: How to add another crown icon?
item.dc:creator: @k0_gawd_k0 k0 gawd k0
item.description:
@k0_gawd_k0 wrote:

well i found one, but… it only explains how to add custom ones, i need a tut that tells you how to add another crown instead of only having 2 (mod, admin) you can have owner crown also.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add another crown icon?

item.title: How to add another crown icon?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I really know nothing about clients. But, you probably need to create a new sprite and load it with your other mod icons. I don’t know what class that would be in.

To be honest, I think there was a tutorial on changing the crown sprites…so maybe you could take a look at that.

Use the search bar to find it in the client hacking section.

Read full topic
item.source: How to add another crown icon?
